document.body:
On this page you will find some samples generated by bpm4struts, you are able to download both UML models and web application bundles.
Online-store
This sample is the one explained in the how-to, take a look at the both the model and the deployable web application .
In order to get the most out of this sample you should take note of the following points:
Any web container able to deploy WAR bundles should work.
Point your browser to the following URL:
http://127.0.0.1:8080/online-store-sample-web
Follow this link to see this sample application running, what you will see is purely generated from UML using bpm4struts, no manual implementation has been added. Further more, only the bare essentials have been modeled, no documentation or anything like that, only what is in the how-to:
http://team.andromda.org:8080/online-store-sample-web
